response.original_title: Solveig: The Life and Artwork of Solveig Arneng Johnson
response.overview: A beautiful documentary/love story that illuminates the life of Sami American artist Solveig Arneng Johnson, whose body of artwork captures her love of Norway, family and natural surroundings. Born in 1925 in the Arctic town of Kirkenes, Norway, Solveig reflects on life during the throes of World War II, her indigenous Sami identity, art studies, immigrating to America (Duluth, Minnesota) and the love of her life.
response.title: Solveig: The Life and Artwork of Solveig Arneng Johnson
